div.head: 腹中兒哭
div.div: an infant crying in the abdomen

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: an infant crying in the abdomen

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tai ti 胎啼 , fetal cry. Fu ren liang fang bu yi Gynecological book. Ming era, 15th jiao zhu century. 婦人良方補遺校注 15: “ 治孕婦腹中兒哭，用川 黃連濃煎汁，母常呷之 , “To cure an infant crying in a pregnant woman’s ab domen use chuan huang lian boiled to a concentrated sap. Let the mother ingest this repeatedly”.
